name: Road Kill 3D: Highway Animal Avoidance
description:
Avoid the animals, or smash into them, up to you. Road Kill is the fun 3D game for those who love racing through traffic. Only this time, the traffic is Animals. Swerve and drift across the highway to avoid the animals at all costs. Every time you smash into an animal, there will be damage done to your car or truck. Choose from Sport Car, Pickup truck, or Big Rig. For even more fun, try the Pro Version with the Super Car and Super Big Rig. Become a hunter with your vehicle if you like, but you will have to send you car for repairs if there is too much damage.

Safari Level
--Elephants
--Rhinos
--Zebras
--Lions
--And many more Safari Animals


Forest Level Includes:
--Bears
--Deer
--Horses
--Chickens
--Sheep

Choose to Race during the day or at night. Easy and fun controls. Choose either accelerometer or button controls. Super 3D racing fun.

Main Features
**3D Highway Racing
**Avoid the Animals
**Go for the Best Distance
**Excellent 3D Graphics
**Fun and exciting game play
**Hunt or avoid, up to you
**The Highway Traffic Racing game you have been waiting for. Good Luck!!
